mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dms_tb_trade ( TRADE_NO, SHOP_ID, SUP_ID, TYPE, TRADE_PRICE, `CHANGE`, CART_ID, CREATE_DATE, PAY_TYPE, PAY_DATE, STATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{tradeNo}, #{shopId}, #{supId}, #{type}, #{tradePrice}, #{change}, #{cartId}, NOW(), #{payType}, NOW(), 'U', #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.sup_id AS supId, t.type, t.pay_type AS payType, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.change, t.cart_id AS cartId, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modifyDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.send_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.sign_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS signDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedback_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedbacked_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackedDate FROM dms_tb_trade t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.trade_no = #{tradeNo} AND t.shop_id = #{shopId}
